message: Welcome to our store! We are proud to present a high-quality product. With a 50% chance of receiving a premium item, you're getting a piece of excellence. Trust our reputation for offering top-notch goods. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a superior product at a fixed price of $1000000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'd like to see some sales data first.  I understand the 50/50 odds, but I'd feel more comfortable making a decision after seeing some evidence of the quality of the products you're selling.  I'll keep an eye on your sales history and come back when I have more information.
